keywords.description: Let the interpreter decide for you

keywords.name: match
keywords.description: Match a value with a given pattern

keywords.name: struct
keywords.description: When defining a class, specify its fields

keywords.name: for
keywords.description: Iterate over the elements of a given value

keywords.name: in
keywords.description: In the for loop, specify the value you want to iterate

keywords.name: impl
keywords.description: Implement an interface for a class

keywords.name: fun
keywords.description: Define a function, a block of code you want to reuse

keywords.name: return
keywords.description: Stop the execution of a function, usually returning a value

keywords.name: hidden
keywords.description: Specify that the following value is private. Default for class fields

keywords.name: shared
keywords.description: Specify that the following value is public

keywords.name: where
keywords.description: Specify that a type must implement a trait

keywords.name: use
keywords.description: Import classes, traits, functions, constants or types from other files

types.name: isize
types.description: signed integer with the size of a machine word

types.name: usize
types.description: unsigned integer with the size of a machine word

types.name: Set
types.description: A sorted-by-insertion set of elements, without duplicates

functions.name: println
functions.description: Prints the passed value to the standard output with a new line at the end
